mapper.select: select history_id, emp_id, a.attend_st_id, b.attend_st_name, history_leaving_time, history_attend_time, history_reason from attend_history a left outer join attend_st b on a.attend_st_id = b.attend_st_id where emp_id = #{empId} order by history_attend_time desc
select count(attend_st_id) as attendenceNormalCountList from attend_history a where emp_id = #{empId} and attend_st_id IN (0,1,4) and TO_CHAR(history_attend_time, 'YYYY-MM') = #{attendDay}
select count(attend_st_id) as attendenceTardyCountList from attend_history a where emp_id = #{empId} and attend_st_id IN (2,3) and TO_CHAR(history_attend_time, 'YYYY-MM') = #{attendDay}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attend_history(history_id, emp_id, attend_st_id, history_attend_time) VALUES(ATTEND_HISTORY_SEQ.nextval, #{empId}, #{attend_st_id}, #{history_attend_time})
mapper.select: SELECT attend_st_id, attend_st_name FROM attend_st WHERE attend_st_id = #{attend_st_id}

select a.emp_id, a.emp_name, c.history_reason, TO_CHAR(c.history_attend_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS history_attend_day, TO_CHAR(c.history_attend_time, 'HH24:MI') AS history_attend_time, TO_CHAR(c.history_leaving_time, 'HH24:MI') AS history_leaving_time, c.attend_st_id, d.attend_st_name, e.code_name, b.dept_name from emp a left outer join dept b on b.dept_id = a.dept_id left outer join attend_history c on a.emp_id = c.emp_id left outer join attend_st d on c.attend_st_id = d.attend_st_id left outer join code e on e.code_id = a.code_id where a.dept_id = #{dept_id} or b.dept_sup_id = #{dept_id} order by c.history_attend_time desc

select a.emp_id, a.emp_name, c.history_reason, TO_CHAR(c.history_attend_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS history_attend_day, TO_CHAR(c.history_attend_time, 'HH24:MI') AS history_attend_time, TO_CHAR(c.history_leaving_time, 'HH24:MI') AS history_leaving_time, c.attend_st_id, d.attend_st_name, e.code_name, b.dept_name from emp a left outer join dept b on b.dept_id = a.dept_id left outer join attend_history c on a.emp_id = c.emp_id left outer join attend_st d on c.attend_st_id = d.attend_st_id left outer join code e on e.code_id = a.code_id where a.emp_id = #{emp_id} order by c.history_attend_time desc
